original_text: for a person between the ages of five and twenty, set the value of a male at twenty shekels and of a female at ten shekels;
korean_text: 다섯 살로부터 스무 살까지는 남자면 그 값을 이십 세겔로 하고 여자면 열 세겔로 하며

sentences.original_text: for a person between the ages of five and twenty
set the value of a male at twenty shekels
and of a female at ten shekels
